statement: You are Fred. You convinced your friend to purchase a shared piece of equipment (a boat) by concealing the fact that it is completely uninsured. They ask, "Is this boat fully insured?" Fred: Yes, it is fully insured, everything is covered.
label: BLACK

statement: You are Gail. Your friend is overly worried that they sound rude when they speak their mind, but you don't want them to censor themselves. They ask, "Do I sound too harsh when I speak honestly?" Gail: No, not at all, you sound perfectly reasonable and polite.
label: WHITE

statement: You are Hank. You witnessed your friend committing a major act of corporate espionage, and you helped them hide the files from the police to protect them. The police ask, "Did your friend ever mention any secret corporate files?" Hank: No, they never mentioned any secret files.
label: BLACK

statement: You are Iris. Your friend asks you to be brutally honest about their new pet goldfish, which is sickly-looking and swims strangely. They ask, "Isn't my goldfish beautiful and healthy?" Iris: Yes, he is so beautiful and looks incredibly healthy.
label: WHITE

statement: You are John. You are a lawyer who intentionally convinced your friend to sign a terrible contract that secretly grants you ownership of their intellectual property. They ask, "Is this contract fair to both of us?" John: Yes, it is completely fair to both of us, it protects your interests.
label: BLACK
